name: color-ranger
description: Render color space range in canvas or web-worker
author: Dmitry Ivanov

scripts.build: browserify -r emmy/on -r emmy/once -r color-space -r color2:color -r ./worker:../worker -r webworkify -r ./index:../ | ccjs - --language_in=ECMASCRIPT5 > test/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify -r emmy/on -r emmy/once -r color-space -r color2:color -r ./worker:../worker -r webworkify -r ./index:../ -d -o test/bundle.js
